title: Loading Screen stuck at 0% and loads after a long time
body: There is this ongoing problem where i select the champion and when the loading screen starts it is stuck at 0% and loads after 5-7 minutes or it doesn't load at all and i have to shut down and restart the game. I have a high-end pc and my internet connection is 11mb/s, the problem is probably caused by the new client and basically i cannot join before minute 5 or 6, sometimes even at minute 9-14.

replies.body: Your client is likely having some problems making that initial connection with the game servers you were going to be playing on. Most of the time you can make a few adjustments to your network settings to smooth things out, so let's start with port forwarding and DNS settings. If you aren't sure how to make those changes, check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
